region:
Modus hic est: Fiat triang: æquil: ABD, divisâq́ diametro AB in tot partes æquales,
quot laterum est figura inscribenda, duabusq́ earum p̃termissis et à B versùs A, ducat,
per initium tertiæ recta DF, & hinc recta FB, quam putat esse latus polygoni optati
Anal: Sit secta diameter utcunq́ in E, e , ductæq́ DEF, FA, & FB & demissa in diametrum per-
pendicularis FG, fiat CB=a, CE vel Ce=b, FB=x, unde AF=\sqrt{\mathstrut}\,\overline{4aa-xx}
